Name: Meowlux Wish Coin (Bound)
Description: Using a Wish coin allows for one Wish, and the prize is guaranteed to be bound. Rewards include limited edition mounts, outfits, accessories, design blueprints, dye materials, and there is also a chance to receive Meowlux Premium Cards and Vault Cards.
Description2: It is worth mentioning that the Meowlux Premium Card itself is a valuable item, allowing you to purchase seasonal outfits, jewelry, and specially customized hairstyles designed by the Guild's studios.
